page.title: 10OUR INTERVIEWS
page.content: We wanted to ask people some questions about living in our Village. We chose 3 different groups of people and they came into school & we interviewed them. Half of them had always{lived}here or near here- the next biggest group came here from London. What{they liked}about the Village was the fact it was in the country & a friendly place. The worst of{the dislikes}was the amount of traffic. When asked what{extra amenity the Village needed, more than 50% said a chemist. Apart from not much work here, what{concerned them}was the need of a Village bypass.This was also mentioned as the{main improvement} needed.{In the future}they thought a bypass would be built & with more development, our Village would eventually join up with Clacton.They didn't like this at all.
